metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14983 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: The server in Chocolate Doom 3.0.0 and Crispy Doom 5.8.0 doesn't validate the user-controlled num_players value, leading to a buffer overflow. A malicious user can overwrite the server's stack.

criterions.comment: chocolate-doom: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
